snippet.title: Half-Life 2: Update Comparison Trailer
snippet.description:
A side-by-side comparison that shows the difference in visual fidelity between the current PC version of Half-Life 2 and the newly-released Half-Life 2: Update. We believe that many small details make a big difference, so we encourage viewers to take their time to see what we’ve done.

Half-Life 2: Update is available now on Steam!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/290930

Join the Steam Group for all the latest news:
http://steamcommunity.com//games/HL2Update

For more information on Half-Life 2: Update check out our Introduction Trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q9X7mNyTmu8

For a more in-depth look, check out our official game brochure
http://store.steampowered.com/quickref/290930
